oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Looking South from Delany's Point, Missionary Ridge, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of people walking along Delany's Point in Missionary Ridge. There are two cannons and a tower visible atop the hillside. Features a white bottom border, an undivided back, and handwritten correspondence on both sides. Postcard printed in Germany. June 30, 1906 and July 1, 1906 postmarks. [No. 2176] Note: Aside from a spelling variation of "Delany's," this is an additional copy of this postcard and contains the same image as 49251 and 49252.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: People; Towers; Cannons; Land; Trees
